fields.name: client_face
fields.fieldText:
Have we met the client face to face?

 

 If yes who? 

 

If “No” the client must be treated as high risk

fields.name: Names

fields.name: PEP
fields.fieldText: Has the client, a member of their family or a known close associate become a Politically Exposed Person (PEP) Special Interest person (SIP) or been Sanctioned?

fields.name: EDD
fields.fieldText: If the client is assessed as high risk and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD) procedures apply, please document below. If you need help, please consult with the AML Risk team.

fields.name: Risk
fields.fieldText: Considering the above factors, the Money Laundering Risk is:

fields.name: risk_level
fields.fieldText: Has the risk level changed from Normal to High since the previously recorded risk level?

screens.name: PERSONAL_TAX_SOLE_TRADER_OR_INDIVIDUAL
screens.label: PERSONAL TAX, SOLE TRADER OR INDIVIDUAL

fields.name: Annual
fields.fieldText:
ANNUAL ONGOING MONITORING

& ADDITIONAL SERVICE CHECKLIST

fields.name: Personal
fields.fieldText: PERSONAL TAX, SOLE TRADER OR INDIVIDUAL

fields.name: Client_or_Trust_name
fields.fieldText: Client or Trust name

fields.name: NI_and_or_UTR_number
fields.fieldText: NI and/or UTR number

fields.name: Prepared_by
fields.fieldText: Prepared by

fields.name: Date
fields.fieldText: Date:

fields.name: General
fields.fieldText:
Please use this checklist to add new services, make adhoc changes and

annual ongoing monitoring checks.

fields.name: Comments
fields.fieldText: Comments (Yes or No and additional explanations)

fields.name: considered_changes
fields.fieldText:
Have you considered changes that may alter the original assessment of the acceptability of the client and engagement.

Examples of changes that shall cause a careful reconsideration are:

  • changes in name and/or address;
  • new sources of finance;
  • change of Trustees
  • new regulatory reporting requirements: and/or
  • additional service added.

fields.name: conducted
fields.fieldText:
Have you conducted conflict checking to determine whether there are any changes as noted below.

  • do we now act for any other family members, close relationships
  • are their any new connections to CP employees
  • has the client introduced any companies/trust’s linked to them

Any such changes will require reconsideration of the firm’s conflict checking procedures

fields.name: amlRisk
fields.fieldText: AML Risk Assessment Questions below, if you answer yes to questions 1-3, please mark as High risk and complete enhanced CDD.

fields.name: c
fields.fieldText: 1)

fields.name: client_hold_assets
fields.fieldText: Does the client hold assets or undertake activities overseas?

fields.name: display2
fields.fieldText: 2)

fields.name: links
fields.fieldText: Does the client have links with individuals or businesses in overseas countries with weak money laundering regimes?

fields.name: diplay3
fields.fieldText: 3)

fields.name: anonymity
fields.fieldText: Does the client use products, services or entities which provide anonymity?

fields.name: concerns
fields.fieldText: Have we established the source of the client’s wealth? Please give details below.

fields.name: funds
fields.fieldText: Have we established the source of the client’s funds? Please give details below.

fields.name: anticipate
fields.fieldText: Do we anticipate holding monies for the client?
